issue.title: Firehose grasping is non physical on body movement

content.raw:
Sisir, I think this may be a problem with the using the keyboard_teleop script. The cmd_vel topic directly teleports the robot, which bypasses physics. There was a previous question on the [gazebo answers forum](http://answers.gazebosim.org/question/2186/imu-not-measuring-acceleration-and-angular-rates/) asking why the imu doesn't work with the cmd_vel topic.

I'll think about a change to the cmd_vel topic that would help with your testing.
